title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: This post was made by Bitcoin Penny, but moved to another section.Figured this was worth a repost and more exposure!! Original Thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5394604Quote from: BitcoinPenny on April 14, 2022, 05:28:30 PMNFTs? More like NF…Ds!Thousands of times over the last few years, you’ve asked us to turn our fun little doodles into highly collectible NFTs.Well…we finally did it!Introducing the all new Bitcoin Penny® NFD...or Non-Fungible Doodle!"How can I grab one of these crazy NFDoodles?"A fresh new series of TEN (10) unique and colorful Bitcoin Penny® NFDs will drop each Friday on OpenSea.io for a flash 24-hour auction.Our first series will drop this Friday, April 15, 2022 @ 10AM EST. On that day, the following NFDs will be available to the highest bidder:          Series 1 — No. 1/10 “Sir Reginald at the Museum"          Series 1 — No. 2/10 “Sir Reginald at the Aquarium"          Series 1 — No. 3/10 “Sir Reginald in a Dark Alley"          Series 1 — No. 4/10 “Sir Reginald in Oz"          Series 1 — No. 5/10 “Sir Reginald on the Moon"          Series 1 — No. 6/10 “Sir Reginald at a Ski Resort"          Series 1 — No. 7/10 “Sir Reginald in Wonderland"          Series 1 — No. 8/10 “Sir Reginald at the Beach"          Series 1 — No. 9/10 “Sir Reginald at the Carnival"          Series 1 — No. 10/10 “Sir Reginald on a Journey to Mordor" SPOILER: Our very first series of NFDs will feature our beloved mascot Sir Reginald Pennyman™ on a few of his many wonderful adventures. THANK YOU for supporting our little doodles for SEVEN years, everyone!Chris Bianco @ TBPCo.In Code We Trust / E-Currency Unum
